text: Hi all! I work with .SITE domains, a new domain extension for businesses. As part of our marketing, we are looking to gather some insights from founders of branding / marketing / web dev agencies in the US; specifically if your agency is 0 to 2 years old and employs more than 1 person. If you or someone you know would be willing to speak with us over a Zoom call, it would greatly help our research. As a thank you, my team will send you a $50 Amazon voucher soon after. Please DM me. Thank you so much! :slightly_smiling_face:
